description: Bunny Girl by Saph1s for VK
additional_info:
v1.2 - Some icons have been replaced and the color of the text has been changed
v1.1 - Little fix
v1.0 - Create
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://vk.com/") {
/*____v 1.1____*/

body {
    background-size: cover !important;
}
body[onresize] {
    background-size: cover !important;
    animation-name: bgrd;
    animation-iteration-count: infinite;
}

#page_layout:before,
#page_header_cont:before {
    background: none !important;
    background-image: none !important;
    filter: none !important;
    -webkit-filter: none !important;
    -moz-filter: none !important;
}

#page_header_cont .back:before {
    content: '';
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    height: 46px;
    width: 100%;
    background: #242323 !important;
    filter: none !important;
    -webkit-filter: none !important;
    -moz-filter: none !important;
}

#page_header_cont .back:after {
    content: '';
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    height: 46px;
    width: 100%;
    filter: none !important;
    -webkit-filter: none !important;
    -moz-filter: none !important;
}
.page_header_wrap:before {
    background: transparent !important;
}

#page_layout:before {
    display: none !important;
}
#page_header_cont .back:after {
    background: var(--coloursync) !important;
}
/*===============MADE BY Saph1s================*/
*::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 15px !important;
    height: 10px !important;
    background: var(--color9) !important;
    border: 1px solid var(--color3) !important;
}

*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    min-height: 28px !important;
    background: var(--color7) !important;
}


/*[[mini_dialog]]*/
body {
    background: url(https://i.ibb.co/dPy0CKT/1042594-1920.png) no-repeat fixed center 0;
    background-size: cover;
}

body {
    background-image: url(https://i.ibb.co/dPy0CKT/1042594-1920.png) !important;
}
/*======================background===========================*/
::selection {
    background-color: var(--color2);
    color: #ccc;
}
::-moz-selection {
    background-color: var(--color2);
    color: #ddd !important;
}

.nim-dialog--name-w > span:first-child {
